summary:
Language professional with a solid educational background and experience in engineering, science and technology, providing translation services to direct clients, mainly international organizations (ESA, EUMETSAT, UN Offices), helping them conveying the right message to their audience.

Expertise fields: Aeronautics and Space, Climate and Weather, Environment, Statistics, Engineering, Physics, Chemistry.
